title: Anyone wana grind to challenger for them jackets. P1 atm Solo queue or Team ranked.
body:
We got like just over two weeks so want to see where I peak.

I generally play utility champions so not a hard carry person but can still play all roles.
Non toxic, knowledgeable to some degree lol.

Generally go even in laning phase or at least not too far behind. 

Roles in strength order from my perspective.
Support is the strongest.
Mid
Adc
Top 
JG is the weakest.

replies.body: i'm interested, although i'm only G5, still would be interested to learn from a higher elo player and try to get better, i'm an adc main but can also play mid, i tend to either go even in laning phase or come out slightly ahead, rough games i'm not too far behind depending on how badly i get ganked/camped, if you're interested (i know it's a long shot but hey, gotta try right? :P) hit me up ~wako487
